display_long_description:
# ✨NEW IN THIS UPDATE! ✨

- **4-PLAYER COOP CHAOS IS HERE!**
- **10-PERSON SOCIAL LOBBIES ARE LIVE!**


👾**Enter a Spooky 4-floor Dungeon**: packed with monsters, traps, secrets and surprises. Fight, explore, or just fool around with friends.

🤝**Play Solo or Co-op (New 4-Player Max)**: Play solo or with up to **three friends** in this **co-op sandbox dungeon crawler**. Every fight hits hard. Boss battles hit harder(Built-in voice supported)

💥**10-Person Social Lobbies**: Bring all your friends, hang out, and jump into the dungeon chaos!

🧊**Fast, Tactical Combat**: Sword or bow? Dash or dodge? Combat is **fast,intense, and tactical**. Bosses evolve. Only **teamwork** and **smart planning** will keep you alive.

🎄**Shape Your Playstyle**: Unlock your **talent tree** and **shape your playstyle**: smash or snipe. It's up to you. 

🧙‍♀️**Choose Your Hero Class**: Witch Hunter, Black Knight, Birdman...**More coming soon**——and you help vote on the next avatar in the Discord.

🧠**Explore and Discover**: Discover hidden rooms. Trigger traps. Loot hard. This dungeon **goes deeper than it looks**...
